name: alex young
bio: I am an enthusiastic archaeologist who enjoys writing mystery novels.
description: I’m Alex Young, a builder of worlds and creator of epic tales. My stories are intricately designed, with magic systems and plots that challenge the imagination. I love crafting characters who feel real, even in extraordinary settings. Through my books, I aim to immerse you in adventures you’ll never forget.

name: joe alen
bio: I am passionate about inventing languages. One of the fictional tongues I've invented is the Elvish tongue
description: I’m Joe Alen, a weaver of myths and dreams. I craft stories that dance between whimsy and darkness, drawing on folklore, history, and imagination. Whether it’s a tale for children or adults, my goal is to remind you that there’s magic in the world—if you’re willing to look for it.

name: alexa timber
profession: Poet, Memoirist, and Civil Rights Activist
bio: I love cooking and sometimes I blend my culinary expertise with my storytelling. I wrote a cookbook (Hallelujah! The Welcome Table), please check it out
description: I am Alexa Timber, a writer who seeks to capture the ebb and flow of human consciousness. My prose is an exploration of time, memory, and the emotions that shape us. I strive to reveal the profound in the ordinary, to illuminate the quiet moments that often go unnoticed.

name: Ashley star
bio: I am a dedicated long-distance runner and have completed multiple marathons. I've written a memoir about it, What I Talk About When I Talk About Running. Check it out!!!!
description: I am Ashley Star, a writer who walks the fine line between reality and dreams. My stories often delve into the surreal, weaving ordinary lives with extraordinary mysteries. I enjoy exploring themes of loneliness, love, and the quiet beauty hidden in everyday life. Through my words, I invite you to step into a world where anything feels possible, yet profoundly human.
